climbs.name: Yuk Foo
climbs.fa: Tyler Dziedzina and Autumn the Dog, Summer 2020

content.description: Yuk Foo is an amazing, highball, OW problem. Start in the cave, then work your way out with baggy fists and stacks. The highball part of this one is easy OW.
content.location:
It is on the north shoulder of Almost Asshole Rock.

GPS coordinates are: 39.334198,-105.276396.

climbs.name: Play The Greatest Hits
climbs.fa: Tyler Dziedzina and Autumn the Dog, Summer 2020

content.description: On this beautiful offwidth boulder, start in the back of the cave, invert, and traverse out to the lip. Pivot, and traverse some more until you can stand up. This is fun!
content.location:
It is 25 yards uphill from "

Yuk Foo

."

climbs.name: I Ain't Afraid of No Toast
climbs.fa: Tyler Dziedzina and Autumn the Dog

content.description:
This probably is only worth doing if you are climbing "

Hasta Linguine, Baby

". Start on hand jams, and work your way out as the crack widens.
content.location:
It is 20 feet NW of

Hasta Linguine, Baby

.

climbs.name: Show Me The Honey!
climbs.fa: Tyler Dziedzina and Autumn the Dog

content.description:
Climb the overhanging corner finger crack left of "

Frankly, My Dear....

"
content.location:
It is left of "

Frankly, My Dear....

"

climbs.name: Hasta Lasagna, Baby
climbs.fa: Tyler Dziedzina and Autumn the Dog, Summer 2020

content.description:
This is a beautiful and classic splitter roof crack boulder that goes through all the sizes. Start on fingerlocks in the cave, and work your way out into hands, fists, then an offwidth exit at the end. The finish can be kinda dabby as there is a small boulder behind you, but with the right beta, you shouldn't have a problem. This one is like a mini-"

Bad Ju-Ju

."
content.protection: Pads, a micro-pad or blanket for the dabby boulder, and a spotter for the end.
content.location:
It is on the southwest shoulder of the Son of Asshole Rock boulderfield right over the babbling brook.

GPS coordinates are: 39.3344655, -105.2783762.

climbs.name: Frankly, My Dear, I Don't Give a Yam
climbs.fa: Tyler Dziedzina and Autumn the Dog

content.description: On this quality, awkward, offwidth boulder, start in the back of the cave on hand jams, invert, and pivot out the lip.
content.location:
It is 100 yards downstream of "

Hasta Linguine Baby

".
